body_html:
Thanks for finding this rather egregious bug. We've got a bugfix ready and hope to submit it today, and merge it into the TF1.2 branch. We'll also be adding some better (functional) unit tests in the coming week.

body:
Thanks for finding this rather egregious bug.  We've got a bugfix ready and
hope to submit it today, and merge it into the TF1.2 branch.  We'll also be
adding some better (functional) unit tests in the coming week.

On Thu, May 18, 2017 at 9:18 AM, ebrevdo <notifications@github.com> wrote:
